Literature.Title: Physicochemical and Biological Characterization of Novel Membrane-Active Cationic Lipopeptides with Antimicrobial Properties.
Literature.Author: Juhaniewicz-Dębińska J, Lasek R, Tymecka D, Burdach K, Bartosik D, Sęk S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:12% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml,Horse erythrocytes:83% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:97% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae PCM 1(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(no activity data),Yersinia enterocolitica PCM 2081(no activity data),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 14506(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(no activity data)
